description: You have a range of different cage upgrades that you can use, below are the available upgrades
- Speed I Cage Upgrade: Increases Cage Speed by 50%
- Speed II Cage Upgrade: Increases Cage Speed by 100%
- Speed III Cage Upgrade: Increases Cage Speed by 200%
- Looting Cage Upgrade: Applies Looting III to the cage drops
- Arrow Cage Upgrade: Kills entities inside the cage with arrows
- Cooking Cage Upgrade: Automatically cooks cookable entity drops
- Lightning Cage Upgrade: Kills entities inside the cage with lightning
- Experience Cage Upgrade: Entities killed inside the cage drop Crystallized Experience
